common.description: System properties required for all entities (nodes and edges)

property_descriptions.data_source_id: Identifies which data source this entity came from (e.g., 'ds-123')
property_descriptions.source_path: The file path within the data source where this entity was extracted from

node_specific.description: Additional system properties required only for nodes

property_descriptions.slug: Unique human-readable identifier for the node (e.g., 'alice-smith', 'kartograph')

edge_specific.description: Additional system properties required only for edges

node_total.description: All system properties for nodes (common + node-specific)

edge_total.description: All system properties for edges (common + edge-specific)

_metadata.description: Auto-generated system property definitions. DO NOT EDIT manually. Run 'python scripts/export-system-properties.py' to regenerate.
